title: calt
content:

'calt' is an [OpenType](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014132234/http:/typophile.com/wiki/OpenType) [feature tag](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014132234/http:/typophile.com/wiki/feature%20tag) with the friendly name "Contextual Alternates". [Click here](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014132234/http:/www.microsoft.com/typography/otspec/features_ae.htm#calt) to read the spec from the Microsoft Layout Tag Registry.
